Description: Fragment of tapestry; the decoration has two freizes with stylised motifs, one at the bottom is fragmentary; warp- undyed wool? (S/8 ribs per cm), weft- dyed wool (red? now faded, S/36) and undyed linen; flying threads in undyed linen (S); all edges cut and ragged
Curator's comments: includes small bag with loose fibres from conservation and with small yellow label '6651g', on left of the textile is a spot of red glue from the label
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
